preferenceslist-preferenceslist: Page title of the PreferencesList special page.
preferenceslist-preferenceslist-intro: Text displayed as an intorduction on the PreferencesList SpecialPage.
preferenceslist: Text of the link to the PreferencesList special page on SpecialPages.
preferenceslist-csv: Checkbox label on bottom of the PreferencesList SpecialPage
preferenceslist-nofields: Message shown to users who submit the form with no selected fields.
